task.title: Learn with a video
task.shortdesc: Watch and listen to broaden your vocabulary

taskbody.context: You can discover new vocabulary by watching videos registered by native speakers.

step.cmd: Go to the Immerse tab, and click a video.
After watching the video, click Show scenario to display related vocabulary.
step.info: Based on your learning history, the app shows you how many words you already know.

substep.cmd: Click to mark a word as known/unknown.

step.cmd: Click Learn words to start a session.
Click Continue to move to the next card.

taskbody.result: After completing the session, you'll see a summary of your progress.
